title: Ranjith and Herath take oaths as new Chief Ministers
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: President Media Unit) S.M. Ranjith and Maheepala Herath were sworn in as Chief Ministers of North-Central and Sabaragamuwa Provinces respectively before President Mahinda Rajapaksa this morning on 24 September. The sworn in ceremony took place at the Presidential Secretariat….
